sentences.english: He was a very tall,big man with blue eyes and a lot of white hair.
sentences.chinese: 他高大魁梧，蓝眼睛，长着一头浓密的白发。

sentences.english: Tibetan mastiffs are massive, fluffy status symbols there.
sentences.chinese: 藏獒很魁梧，在那里象征着路威。

sentences.english: The general is a portly old man.
sentences.chinese: 那位将军是位身材魁梧的老人。

sentences.english: A tall, brawny woodsman stood leaning against a tree which stood upon the bank of the river.
sentences.chinese: 一个个子魁梧，身体壮实的伐木人依着岸边的一颗树。

sentences.english: He was a big, well-built man, and rather heavy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个高大魁梧的人，相当健壮。

sentences.english: Ping Jue seems in this half year long Gao, also taller and huge in stature.
sentences.chinese: 冯爵在这半年好像长高了，也更魁梧了。

sentences.english: Those football players are huge. They look burly.
sentences.chinese: 那些橄榄球运动员看上去既高大，又魁梧。

sentences.english: Tall and strapping Liu interviews of the drug did not make them apathetic .
sentences.chinese: 身材魁梧的小刘接受采访时完全没有吸毒者的萎靡。

sentences.english: He is a tall, burly fellow with long hair and more white than black to his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他是身材魁梧，个子很高，长发，眼白多于眼珠。

sentences.english: He was heavily-built and sported a red moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他身材魁梧，留着红色的八字胡。

sentences.english: You feel bigger and stronger than the next guy.
sentences.chinese: 你感到你比对面的人更强壮更魁梧。

sentences.english: The football player is big and muscular.
sentences.chinese: 这个足球运动员张得魁梧强壮。

sentences.english: Finished with Italian Leather or aniline leather upholstery and strapping.
sentences.chinese: 完成与意大利皮革或苯胺革椅垫和魁梧。
